/** This value is used in isThemeCompatible method. only version node with an * higher version number will be used in [theme]/config.xml * @since 1.4.0.11, check theme compatibility 1.4 * @static */
/** $check_features is a multidimensional array used to check [theme]/config.xml values, * and also checks prestashop current configuration if not match. * @static */

Warning: No mobile logo has been defined. The header logo will be used instead.
